title: Volcano tourism is booming, but is it too risky?

title: Italy's Mount Etna rumbles back to life with a "lava fountain"
description: Europe's most active volcano, Mount Etna on Sicily, is erupting again, sending a huge plume of ash and smoke into the air and lava flowing down its slope.
content: Mount Etna, the rambunctious volcano on the Italian island of Sicily, grumbled back to life on Monday, spewing hot ash and lava in a pyroclastic flow, the nation's volcano monitoring body said. There… [+1969 chars]

title: Mount Etna erupts as large plumes rise from volcano
description: The full scale of the eruption is currently unclear and disruption appears to be minimal.
content:
Italy's Mount Etna has erupted, with large plumes of ash and smoke seen rising from the volcano.

title: Watch: Italy's Mount Etna volcano erupts, spewing hot ash and lava
description: Mount Etna erupted on Monday on the Italian island of Sicily, spewing ash and lava into the air, Italy's volcano monitoring body said. Videos captured the spectacular eruption, showing plumes of ash filling the sky.
